notes: The design adheres to local building norms with sufficient setbacks and open spaces.
Vastu principles have been integrated, focusing on room orientation and energy flow, particularly in positioning of entrances, libraries, and bedrooms.
Colonial style elements are incorporated through arches, wrought iron details, and symmetry.
